body.name: REKDOM Bluetooth Label Printer Wireless Thermal Printer for Shipping Packages, Compatible with iPhone, Android and Windows, Support Amazon, Ebay, Etsy, USPS, Shopify and etc.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 7 hrs 28 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 10 hrs 28 mins
features: 【Wireless Bluetooth or Wired USB Connectivity】 Wireless Bluetooth connectivity supports Windows, Android/iOS Smartphone and tablet. Wired USB connectivity supports Windows, Mac, Linux and Chrome OS. Download the driver from USB disk or official website and install it for PC use, 2 more minutes Bluetooth setup only for Windows. Simply and quickly pair with Bluetooth for smartphone and tablet use.

【Free “Rekdom Printer” APP】 Bluetooth printing from Android/iOS Smartphone and tablet via "Rekdom Printer" APP with “Crop Image” and “Scan Barcode” functions. Allow you to crop any PDF label files to match your label sizes. Directly scan 1D/2D barcode from paper, substance or screen and instantly print the exact barcode labels out. Print labels anytime, anywhere, ideal for e-commerce/small business/home office/household usage, saving your time and enjoying your work!

【Compatibility of Size and Platform】 Print label sizes from 1.5” to 4.1” (38mm-104mm) width to use in a variety of usage scenarios. Simply adjust the paper guides to fit different labels such as shipping labels, address labels, bar-code labels, price labels, warehouse labels, logo labels and etc. Compatible with most platforms including Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Shopify, Shippo, Poshmark, PayPal, Shipstation, USPS, UPS, Pirateship and more.

【Advanced Thermal and Auto Label Detection Technology】 Advanced direct thermal technology without ink and ribbon, minimizing the cost of maintenance and consumables. Automatically detect the label size and stop at the beginning of label, adequately utilize the first label. Stable 150mm/s high print speed and 203dpi commercial grade resolution for both Bluetooth and USB transmission.

【Reliable After-Sales Service】 Provide Type C to USB port transfer adapter inside the package for type C devices. REKDOM always provide professional technical solution via Email and Phone. Try to contact us at first time to get technical support since most of issues can be resolved in minutes.

productInformation.value: Bluetooth connection, easy to setup via "rekdom printer" app, High speed printing, Auto label identification, Inkless, all you buy are the BU820 printer and labels See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Efficient Bluetooth printing solutions Wireless Bluetooth Connection for iPhone,iPad and Android Devices 1. Go to App Store or Google Play to download "Rekdom Printer" app and install it. 2. Connect the power cord, load the labels and turn on the printer. 3. Open "Rekdom Printer" app and Tap "Printer Icon" to connect the BU820 Printer. 4. Import or share the PDF file from the social media, selling and shipping platforms. Crop the file if needed, select the paper size and print the label. Wireless Bluetooth Connection for Windows PC 1. Download Windows driver from purple USB stick or official website. 2. Connect the power cord, USB cable, load the labels and turn on the printer. 3. Double click the driver and follow the prompts to finish the installation. 4. Follow the paper manual guide step by step to setup the Bluetooth Pairing. Note: Prior to connecting, ensure the printer is powered on and your device's Bluetooth function is activated.

Faster, clearer and smarter thermal Bluetooth printer What It Features No ink no toner, no consumable demands.Print labels with commercial grade quality that major couriers require.Support 70pcs/min continuous high volume printing.Advanced auto detection function, always print from the first label. Free "Rekdom Printer" APP Bluetooth connection via“Rekdom Printer” APP for smartphone and tablet users. One click Bluetooth pairing and ready to use, eliminating driver installation. Support importing PDF file directly from your device, iCloud drive, popular platform and social media. Easy to crop file and image to any sizes by finger drag. Instant barcode scanning, a key to generate barcode and print it out. Peel and paste the label, it's that easy! Advanced paper cutter for easily peeling off for every print. Simply paste the label on your package to start your parcel shipping. Works with main platforms including Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Shopify, Shippo, Poshmark, PayPal, Shipstation, USPS, UPS, Pirateship and more.

Works with any direct thermal label paper, no specific labels are required.Simply adjust the paper guides to fit different labels such as 4''x6''/4''x4''/4x3''/4''x2''/3x3"/3''x2''/2.25''x1.25''/2x2''/2''x1'' main labels.REKDOM printer will automatically detect different label sizes and stop at the tear-off line every time you turn on the printer.

Q: What is the purpose of the "Rekdom Printer" App? Does REKDOM BU820 work with other mobile/ipad App? A: It only works with "Rekdom Printer" App. You can import file from your device, iCloud drive and social media, download and open with shipping or selling platform's label via "Rekdom Printer" App and print it out directly. Crop any sizes label into the size you need. Scan barcode and QR code and print it out. Q: Which systems are compatible with Bluetooth capability? A: Bluetooth is compatible with Windows, iOS and Android. Not for Mac, Linux and Chrome OS. Q: Why it is printing side-ways or tiny? A: The most possible reason is that your shipping label page is 8.5x11''. If you are printing shipping labels from these platforms like Amazon, eBay, Shopify, PayPal, Etsy, Pirate Ship, Shipstation...Please change your label setting to 4x6'' before printing. If you cannot figure it out, contact customer support, thank you. Q: My Mac Book doesn’t have a USB port. What can I do? A: We provide a free type C to USB port adapter inside the box to users who need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Thermal Printer
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the purple version of this printer. It is perfect for getting labels printed lightning fast. I don't know if I can rate this printer highly enough, I would do 10 stars if I could! Easy to set up and worked great right out of the box. (The only problem I had was with Bluetooth connection and it turns out you just need to make sure you have "advanced" selected in the Bluetooth devices discovery option for it to show up.) It was very well packaged with everything needed to guide you step by step to using the printer. Love the quality and ease of use! If you need a thermal printer, don't hesitate, buy this printer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars everything you need in a thermal printer
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, has videos and setup booklet for whatever your preference. Prints quickly Printed over 100 barcodes with numbers in about 2 mins. Easily integrated with ebay and a discount postage company. I use both my phone and laptop and have had no issues with Bluetooth connectivity. I have used several different size, shape, and color labels, and have never had to mess with settings of printer. highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worth it! I love this printer soo much! Easy to use and better than buying ink refills and dealing with a hunk of junk printer. I recommend this to any person shipping or creating thermal printer crafts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My little printer
reviews.reviewText: I have an android phone and tablet. This was easy to install. The printing is great. I had tried two others before this one. This was the best one for me. Did not have to return. Great little printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I need to say, it gives you detailed instruction to set up the printer, it gives a USB drives that has the app insides for you to download. everything looks nice and perfect at the beginning when i got it. but the fact is.. it has so many steps to set up the printer. plus if you use the macbook like me, you needs usb to usb-c adapter. (it says the adapter is included as per manual, but it is missing in my order). After following all instructions to set up the printer and finally i printed the sample label, the label is not as clear as i expected. and when i want to print the label that i wanted, the printer shows offline. after several attempts, i gave up. very disappointed experiences. I have to return this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Business owners you need this
reviews.reviewText: I love this printer it makes my life so much easy when it comes to shipping out orders. You can use bluetooth or wifi, connect it to your phone or computer and just download the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Small Business's Dream Sidekick!
reviews.reviewText: Jumping into the world of online sales, the myriad of tasks can be daunting. However, the REKDOM Bluetooth Label Printer swiftly took 'shipping hassles' off my list. This isn't just any printer; it's a small business enhancer. The wireless feature was a massive plus, freeing me from the tangle of cords. It flawlessly connected to both my tablet and phone, making on-the-fly label printing a breeze.The 4x6” labels are just the right size for most of my packages, and the clarity? Top-notch. Given that it’s thermal and inkless, I was thrilled to bypass the frequent ink replacements, saving both time and money.I've primarily used it for my Amazon and eBay shipments, and the compatibility with USPS was an added boon. Set up was pretty intuitive, and the prints were consistently sharp. A little heads-up for Windows users: ensure you have the latest driver installed.All in all, the REKDOM Bluetooth Label Printer was a game-changer for my venture. Whether you're an eCommerce veteran or just starting, this tool is sure to elevate your shipping game. Efficient, compact, and reliable – what more could one ask for?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't calibrate, customer service is not helpful
reviews.reviewText: I cannot get it to calibrate, a label prints half on one label and half on another. It's supposed to be compatible with any label brand and size, but that doesn't seem to be the case.I emailed customer service. He asked me a bunch of questions; I answered, and didn't hear back. I started over hoping to get someone else, mentioning I got no help from "E". Instead of getting actual help "E" answered me; he apparently didn't read my emails, so had to answer again. In the end he gave me some things to try, which I had tried most of them already. In the end; he said he didn't know what to tell me.I believe the poduct will work well if I can ever get it calibrated.
